medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began as crampy in the lower abdomen yesterday morning, followed by a sharp pain in the midepigastrium that woke her from sleep later that morning. Pain is similar to past SBO pain and radiates to the back. She has not passed flatus since yesterday and had one loose bowel movement last night.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Vitamin B12 deficiency, Fatty liver by ultrasound study, Weight-related back pain.
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes in her deceased grandfather, living grandmother; cancer in deceased mother, living aunt; arthritis in deceased grandmother; obesity in grandmother, aunt, and uncles.
